data.title: shrat Sity Frydman, Adv
data.text:
About Me

Well experienced attorney with over 17 years of experience, of them 15 years in high-tech companies.

My name is Oshrat Sity Frydman, I am a highly skilled attorney with extensive international experience, proven negotiation skills, problem solving capabilities and a wide understanding of the law. Being a business and product oriented legal professional, I have a deep understanding of the challenges facing the US and Israeli high-tech industries. With the ability to quickly learn and understand a company’s core technology, corporate culture, business arena and legal issues, I provide companies with high quality legal services and a quick turnaround time.

Member of the Israeli Bar since 1997

Experience

AOL INC, Associate General Counsel. Provided in-house legal counseling to AOL subsidiaries in Israel (Yedda, Relegence, Quigo).

ICQ LTD. VP, General Counsel and Company Secretary.

Israeli Securities Authority, Attorney in legal department.

DR. SHLOMO COHEN & CO. LAW OFFICES, Tel-Aviv. Internship in leading law firm specializing in Intellectual Property.

ROSENBERG, GAVISH &CO. LAW OFFICES, Tel-Aviv . Internship in mid-sized commercial law firm.

Education

MBA (Majored in Marketing and Human Resources), Tel-Aviv University, Leon Recanati Graduate School of Business Administration, Tel- Aviv, Israel. 2001

LL.B, Tel-Aviv University, Law school, Tel-Aviv, Israel. 1997

B.A. (Economics), Tel-Aviv University, School of Economics, Tel-Aviv, Israel 1997

Languages
